{"id":1006007132,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1690534876,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1006007132/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if (n == 0) {\n\n            return 1.0;\n\n        }\n\n        if (n < 0) {\n\n            x = 1 / x;\n\n            long long n_long = n;\n\n            n_long = -n_long;\n\n        return powHelper(x, n_long);\n\n        } else {\n\n            return powHelper(x, n);\n\n        }\n    }\n  double powHelper(double x, long long n) {\n\n        if (n == 1) {\n\n            return x;\n\n        }\n\n        double halfPow = powHelper(x, n / 2);\n\n        return (n % 2 == 0) ? halfPow * halfPow : halfPow * halfPow * x;\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
